arm_group.description: Inhaled milrinone 5 mg(as for the injectable solution)

brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this study is to investigate the concentration-effect relationship of inhaled
      milrinone after prophylactic administration in cardiac surgical patients with preoperative
      pulmonary hypertension undergoing cardiopulmonary bypass.

detailed_description.textblock: Milrinone elimination will be verify with blood and urine samples analysis.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Patients scheduled for elective cardiac surgery under CPB

          -  High risk patients: NYHA class II-III

          -  Preoperative diagnostic of pulmonary hypertension:

               -  Systolic pulmonary artery pressure (sPAP) > 35 mm Hg; or

               -  Mean pulmonary artery pressure (mPAP) > 25 mm Hg; or

               -  mAP/mPAP < 3.0 (after induction of anesthesia).

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Open Heart Surgery

          -  Contraindication to transesophageal echocardiography (TEE)

          -  Hemodynamic instability before surgery

          -  Emergency surgery

intervention.description: Inhaled milrinone 5 mg (as for the injectable solution)

clinical_study.official_title: Pharmacokinetic and Pharmacodynamic of Inhaled Milrinone in Cardiac Surgical Patients

primary_outcome.measure: Study the elimination rate of milrinone administered by inhalation

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: hemodynamic values evaluated will be: central venous pressure, systolic and diastolic pulmonary pressure, wedge, cardiac output, cardiac frequency, systolic and diastolic pressure, SaO2, EtCO2. Patient will also have arterial and venous gaz.  Echographic values will be evaluated to see the cardiac fonction: left and right ventricular systolic and diastolic function and valvular function.
secondary_outcome.measure: Demonstrate the presence or absence of hemodynamic and echographic effects observed after inhalation of milrinone
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 15 min after the of study drug administration

secondary_outcome.description: Verification of the absence of deleterious effects on cardiac output and systemic arterial pressure.
secondary_outcome.measure: Confirmation of the safety of inhaled milrinone

secondary_outcome.description: Efficacy in the treatment of pulmonary hypertension is defined as a reduction of the mean pulmonary pressure of 10-20 %
secondary_outcome.measure: Determination of the efficacy of inhaled milrinone in the treatment of pulmonary hypertension
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 15 min after end of milrinone administration

collaborator.agency: Fonds de la Recherche en Santé du Québec

clinical_study.study_design: Endpoint Classification: Pharmacokinetics/Dynamics Study, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Prevention
